query.queryTemplate: select top 30 Wvssapt.APT_ClINUM, Wvssapt.APT_NAME, Wvssapt.APT_PNAME, Wvssapt.APT_DATE, Wvssapt.APT_TIMSTR, WVSSVET.VET_LAST, WVSSVET.VET_FIRST, WVSSPCK.PCK_CODE, WVSSPCK.PCK_DESC, apt_type from Wvssapt inner join WVSSVET on Wvssapt.APT_VETNUM=WVSSVET.VET_VETNUM inner join WVSSPCK on Wvssapt.APT_BOOK=WVSSPCK.PCK_LINK where WVSSPCK.PCK_CODE=112 and Wvssapt.APT_NAME <> '' and Wvssapt.APT_PNAME <> '' and pck_desc not in ('1 Welcome to Sash','1a. General surgery list','3a. Ophthalmologic surgery list','4. Medicine Procedure list','7. CT procedure','7a.  SASH 1.0 Ultrasound #1','8a. Hospitalized + boarding','8b. Staff Boarding','9 EVENT','9a Reception Messages','9b Medicine Messages','9c Ophtho Messages','9d Surgery Messages','9e Emergency Messages','9f Emergency','9g Oncology Messages','9i Cardiology messages','9k. Dermatology Messages','z Dentistry Messages','O. Radioiodine Treatment','O. Physiotherapy','O. MRI','Blood Bank','Appointment Book Names')and apt_type not in ('Discharge from hospi','Ultrasound','Pickups & Procedures','Cancelled Appt','Procedure','Telephone Message','Inpatient','Inpatient assessment','Internal Referral','Communication','Allergy Vax Initial','Drop Off','Emergency','Allergy Vax Repeat','Lab Results','Meeting','Radioiodine initial','Radioiodine Inpatien','Surgery','Interpretation','Owner visiting','Responsibility','CT Scan','Admitted','Teamwork','MRI','Estimate Required','Phone Calls', 'CT Scan')and apt_type in ('Initial Visit','Recheck','Post op recheck','Chemo')  and (Wvssapt.APT_DATE in ( '@@getDate,-52,yyyy-MM-dd@@', '@@getDate,-32,yyyy-MM-dd@@', '@@getDate,-42,yyyy-MM-dd@@', '@@getDate,-3,yyyy-MM-dd@@', '@@getDate,-15,yyyy-MM-dd@@', '@@getDate,-27,yyyy-MM-dd@@') OR  Wvssapt.APT_DATE < '@@getDate,-150,yyyy-MM-dd@@'  )

select top 1000 apt_type, Wvssapt.APT_ClINUM, Wvssapt.APT_NAME, Wvssapt.APT_PNAME, Wvssapt.APT_DATE, Wvssapt.APT_TIMSTR,WVSSVET.VET_LAST, WVSSVET.VET_FIRST, WVSSPCK.PCK_CODE, WVSSPCK.PCK_DESC from Wvssapt inner join WVSSVET on Wvssapt.APT_VETNUM=WVSSVET.VET_VETNUM inner join WVSSPCK on Wvssapt.APT_BOOK=WVSSPCK.PCK_LINK where WVSSPCK.PCK_CODE=112 and Wvssapt.APT_NAME <> '' and Wvssapt.APT_PNAME <> '' and apt_type in ('Initial Visit','Recheck','Post op recheck','Chemo')  and Wvssapt.APT_DATE < '@@getDate,-200,yyyy-MM-dd@@'
